name: ioUNI
description: ioUNI is a wrapped token that can be bridged to IoTeX from any networks via iotube.UNI is the governance token for Uniswap, an Automated Market Market DEX on the Ethereum blockchain. The UNI token allows token holders to participate in the governance of the protocol. Key decisions such as usage of the treasury or future upgrades can be decided through a governance vote.
